remarks: Implicit substitution of a class for a setvar variable.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Dec-1993.)
statement:
vtoclb.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
vtoclb.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
vtoclb.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
vtoclb.4 $e |- ( ph <-> ps ) $.
vtoclb $p |- ( ch <-> th ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ch x $.
$d th x $.
